meaningMnemonic: You already know that 町 means "town" and that 外れ means "extremity" or "outskirts", and this is just a combination of the two. So this means the <vocabulary>outskirts of town</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You've already learned both 町 and 外れ, so just combine the two and you get 町外れ not only in meaning, but also in reading!
